column2: prev_slaught_dist[,4]<-1 # as we are multiplying with the ice slurry prevalences, we cannot set this to 0, as the calculation would not work. Since we just want the super-intensive prevalence to be 1, we set it to 1 here.
# adjust for the fact that only shrimp who don't die pre-slaughter are slaughtered
# adjust for shrimp slaughtered by electrical stunners provided by SWP
# also adjust for shrimp sold live
